          <title>
            <string language="et">Sõnaliigid</string>
            <string language="en">nouns, adjectives and verbs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gegenstandswörter, Adjektive und Verben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">noms, adjectifs et verbes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">substantivos, adjetivos e verbos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">nomi, aggettivi e verbi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ουσιαστικά, επίθετα και ρήματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sustantivos, adjetivos y verbos</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">Õppematerjaliks on PowerPoint esitlus, mis käsitleb sõnaliike- nimisõnad, omadussõnad ja tegusõnad. Sobib kasutada teema õpetamiseks kui ka kordamiseks.</string>
            <string language="en">PowerPoint presentation about parts of speech- nouns, adjectives and verbs. Suitable both for teaching and revision.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Algõpetus</string>
            <string language="et">Eesti keel</string>
            <string language="et">sõnaliigid</string>
            <string language="en">Basic School</string>
            <string language="en">Estonian language</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">PowerPoint Darstellung über Teile 
Redegegenstandswörter, -adjektive und -verben. Verwendbar beide
für das Unterrichten und Änderung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation de PowerPoint au sujet des parties 
de noms, d'adjectifs et de verbes de la parole. Approprié tous 
les deux pour l'enseignement et la révision.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação de PowerPoint sobre partes de 
substantivos, de adjetivos e de verbos do discurso. Apropriado 
ambos para ensinar e revisão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione del PowerPoint circa le parti dei 
nomi, degli aggettivi e dei verbi di discorso. Adatto entrambi 
per l'istruzione e la revisione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">PowerPoint παρουσίαση για τα μέρη του λόγου - 
ουσιαστικά, επίθετα και ρήματα. Κατάλληλος και για τη 
διδασκαλία και για την αναθεώρηση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación de PowerPoint sobre partes de 
sustantivos, de adjetivos y de verbos del discurso. Conveniente 
ambos para enseñar y la revisión.</string>
          </description>
